alert.note: Alert for East Feliciana; West Feliciana (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 02 at 3:57PM CDT until August 02 at 4:15PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 415 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN WEST FELICIANA...SOUTHWESTERN EAST FELICIANA AND NORTHWESTERN EAST BATON ROUGE PARISHES... At 356 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Zachary, and is nearly stationary. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Zachary, Baker and Slaughter. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in New Orleans.
